data.caption: Corporate Action - Fixes Record Date For 2Nd Interim Dividend FY 26
data.news_body: This is to inform you that in the Board Meeting of the Company proposed to be held on 20th January 2026 the Board may declare the 2nd Interim dividend for FY26 if any. If declared the record date would be 24th January 2026.

data.caption: Corporate Action-Board to consider Dividend
data.news_body: This is to inform you that in the Board Meeting of the Company  proposed to be held on 20th January 2026 the board may also consider payment of 2nd Interim Dividend for FY 26 if any. If Declared the record date would be 24th January 2026.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of Board Meeting
data.news_body:
Dear Sir/Madam
Pursuant to Regulations 30 and 33 of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 (Listing Regulations) we inform you that the Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held today i.e. on 21st July 2025 has inter alia considered and approved the Unaudited Financial Results (both Standalone and Consolidated) for the quarter ended 30th June 2025.
The copies of said Unaudited Financial Results along with Limited Review Reports thereon of
Statutory Auditors Deloitte Haskins & Sells LLP Chartered Accountants are enclosed
herewith.
